overview: A coming of age story about two sisters leading their lives in pole positions, who are summoned to a night's call of decision making. In a frantic attempt to truffle out money, they come up against visions of both a traumatic past and a disturbing reality, while realizing how difficult it is for a family to make ends meet.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: Hussies
